title: Lenovo ThinkPad T14s Gen 3: Release date, price, and everything you need to know
content:
Lenovo refreshed many of its laptops at MWC 2022, and that includes the ThinkPad T14s lineup. The Lenovo ThinkPad T14s Gen 3 comes with more performance courtesy of the new Intel and AMD processors, a taller 16:10 display, and a slightly thinner design. Previous models were already some of the most popular laptops Lenovo makes,

The post Lenovo ThinkPad T14s Gen 3: Release date, price, and everything you need to know appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The Lenovo ThinkPad T14s Gen 3 is a promising business laptop with great performance and a tall screen. Here's what you need to know.
